item.title: Funding Fee Waiver Playbook for VA Buyers
item.description: Ask ten veterans how the funding fee works and you will hear legends, half-truths, and rumors about mysterious VA decisions. The fee funds the program, which means lenders scrutinize every waiver request and every dollar collected. Instead of waiting for the underwriter to tell you what is missing, build a playbook that covers entitlement math, disability documentation, and what to do if the waiver is not yet on your Certificate of Eligibility (COE). Here is the same structure we walk through during BrowseLenders coaching calls.

item.title: VA Condo Approval Recon Checklist
item.description: Condo hunting feels efficient until you learn that “VA approved” is not a guarantee—it is a moving target. Some projects on the VA list have lapsed insurance, outdated budgets, or lingering litigation that can stall your closing. We treat condo shopping like reconnaissance: you gather intel, document risks, and brief your team before you ever submit an offer. Use this recon checklist to stay ahead of the paperwork while your competition wonders why underwriting keeps asking follow-up questions.
